2345: 1. Under COVERAGES A and B, we do not cover: a. any land, including the land supporting the dwelling or other structures; b. the cost to replace, rebuild, stabilize or otherwise restore land; or c. the cost of any device or treatment applied to land for the purpose of adding, protecting or restoring the stability of any structure supported by that land. 2. In addition, under COVERAGE B, we do not cover other structures: a. used in whole or in part for any business; or b. rented or held for rental to any person not a resident of the dwelling, unless used solely as a private garage.
